title: Yami Shibai 4 (Yamishibai: Japanese Ghost Stories 4)
synopsis: Excited children gather around the enigmatic masked Storyteller once more. His unique kamishibai storytelling draws them into tales of fear and dread. These are dark and foreboding stories, which could happen to anyone...
staff: [['Hosoya, Nobuyuki', ['Producer']], ['Hirose, Motoki', ['Producer']], ['Kumamoto, Hiromu', ['Script']], ['Takuto', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition']]]
